strings.schematron.title: Mobility - Recommended
strings.recommended.dcat_theme_tran.title: DCAT theme
strings.recommended.dcat_theme_tran.assert: In most cases, it is assumed that the relevant value for mobility data portals theme is Transport. Check the DCAT theme.
strings.property.removed.title: The property #element in #context was removed in mobilityDCAT-AP.
